topic.title: Troubleshooting
topic.shortdesc: Comprehensive solutions for common issues with the SmartHome Hub.

body.p: If you encounter issues with your SmartHome Hub, this section provides a detailed table of common problems and their recommended solutions. Follow the steps below based on the specific issue you face.

row.entry: Verify the power outlet, check the adapter, and ensure the connection is secure.
Reset the device by unplugging it for 30 seconds, then reconnect power.
Restart your router, verify network credentials, and try moving the Hub closer to the router.
Re-pair the devices via the app; ensure each device is powered on and within range.
Update the app to the latest version or reinstall it from the store.
Ensure a stable internet connection and sufficient power supply during updates.
Check for network congestion, update firmware, and restart the Hub.

body.p: If none of these solutions work, please contact SmartHome Support with the error details and troubleshooting steps you have already taken.
